summary: This retexture makes the dwarven armor a bit more interesting!
descriptionHtml:
[size=40][color=white][b]Dwarven Leather[/b][/color][/size]
[b]Because all that darn metal is way too heavy![/b]

===========================================================
Description
=======================================================
Hi!

So here I was playing skyrim, when suddenly I felt the need to retexture the dwarven armor my character was wearing. I always loved the dwarven armor, but a lot of the great detail of it goes to waste because of its bland, contrastless look. So I decided to replace a whole bunch of the metal plating with a leathery texture, to break things up a bit. This is the result!

[b]If you enjoy the mod, please leave a comment, endorse, and/or do a happy dance.[/b]

===========================================================
Requirements
=======================================================
-none, except a pc that can run skyrim I suppose. I\'ve kept the same resolution, so there should be no performance issues at all. And since its just a retexture, no esp file is needed. 
If you for some reason are having trouble tho, please leave a comment on the discussions page!

===========================================================
Installation
=======================================================
You\'re probably best off using the Nexus mod manager, but if you don\'t like that, a manual install goes like this:
- Download the DwarvenLeather.rar archive from the downloads page
- After that, open the  archive using winrar, or any other archiver that can open .rar files
- In the archiver, extract the file to your skyrim folder. The folder named \"data\" should now merge with the data folder in your skyrim folder. 

===========================================================
Possible future plans
=======================================================
- Make a light armor standalone using this texture.
- Add shield, and perhaps weapon textures.
- Any suggestions?

===========================================================
Disclaimer
=======================================================
I do NOT give permission for this to be uploaded anywhere.
If you wish to use my textures for some other mod, please ask me for permission first. In case I do not reply, the answer is always no.
author: anotherrandomperson
